General.Name: Avic Aviation High Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: AVIC Aviation High-Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells aviation materials and equipment in China. The company offers vertical and horizontal machining centers, CNC lathes, flexible combined machining centers, and aviation-specific equipment, etc. The company was formerly known as Tontec Technology Investment Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AVIC Aviation High-Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2016. AVIC Aviation High-Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Nantong, China.

2.Name: Mr. Xiang Bing  Liu
